title: I drive Military Cutoff every morning. I notice that when a vehicle is exiting Arboretum Dr in Landfall the light changes automatically, but when a vehicle is stopped at the lights at Station Rd and Covil Farms Rd they have a significant wait time. Guess one of the perks of living behind the golden gate.
